attributes.action: use his remaining time in office to secure the release of Paris Hilton
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We call upon the Prime Minister to use the weeks he has left to campaign against the unjust incarceration of Paris Hilton. We feel that a successful outcome to this campaign will secure the legacy he so craves and will be way more important than the work he has done in Northern Ireland.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
